title: About
content: After a couple of months spent on learning Blender and its possibilities with physics simulations, we were assigned the task of generating a short animation based on physical simulations. Being fascinated by the work of Antoni Tudisco and Esteban Diacono, we started by using dance moves found on Youtube videos as a reference, and we ended up creating a music video for Maniac song by Michael Sembello, where many characters - each one with its own peculiar material - have their own stage.
